ygData.subject: fletching
ygData.msgSnippet: so far, have you been having other people bring you the components, or have you actually found a place to get them yourself? :) also, i wasnt aware that you
ygData.messageBody:
so far, have you been having other people bring you the components, or have
you actually found a place to get them yourself? :)

also, i wasnt aware that you had to use more components now.. i thought the
idea with the trade skills allowed you to use the SAME number of components
to get MORE results (thereby making skills like baking not suck.. not as
much, anyway). i could of course be wrong :)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro (lvl 26 now! woo!)
